encyclopaedia.actions module¶

class encyclopaedia.actions.ChangeAction(encyclopaedia, direction, block)[source]¶

Bases: encyclopaedia.actions.EncyclopaediaAction

Base Action that swaps an open entry/page for the previous or next one.

Parameters:
  • encyclopaedia (Encyclopaedia) – The Encyclopaedia instance to use.
  • direction (bool) – The direction to go in. 0 for back, 1 for forward.
  • block (bool) – True if at the first or last entry
get_sensitive()[source]¶

Determines if the button should be alive or not.

Returns:True if the button should be alive, else False.
Return type:bool
class encyclopaedia.actions.ChangeEntryAction(encyclopaedia, direction, block)[source]¶

Bases: encyclopaedia.actions.ChangeAction

Change the current entry being viewed.

Used for switching from one entry to another.

Used by Encyclopaedia’s PreviousEntry() and NextEntry() functions.

get_entry()[source]¶

Get the entry at the given index.

If NOT showing locked entries, the next entry we want to see is the next entry in unlocked_entries. Else, the next entry we want is the next entry in all_entries.

Returns:EncEntry
class encyclopaedia.actions.ChangePageAction(encyclopaedia, direction, block)[source]¶

Bases: encyclopaedia.actions.ChangeAction

Change the current sub-entry being viewed.

Used for switching from one page to another.

Used by an Encyclopaedia’s PreviousPage() and NextPage() functions.
